data.title: ER/Alone in a Crowd
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

Alone in a Crowd is the fifteenth episode of the eleventh season of ER, and the two hundred thirty-eighth episode overall.

Starring: Noah Wyle (Dr. John Carter), Maura Tierney (Dr. Abby Lockhart), Mekhi Phifer (Dr. Gregory Pratt), Goran Visnjic (Dr. Luka Kovac), Sherry Stringfield (Dr. Susan Lewis), Parminder Nagra (Dr. Neela Rasgotra), Linda Cardellini (Nurse Samantha Taggart), Shane West (Dr. Ray Barnett)

and Laura Innes (Dr. Kerry Weaver) (credit only)

Special Guest Stars: Mädchen Amick (Wendall Meade), Eion Bailey (Jake Scanlon), Leland Orser (Dr. Dubenko)

and Cynthia Nixon (Ellie Shore)

Guest Starring: Sara Gilbert (Jane Figler), Scott Grimes (Dr. Archie Morris), Laura Cerón (Chuny Marquez), Ricky Harris ("Mr. Davis"), Camryn Grimes (Erin Shore), James McCauley (Dan Shore), Shawn McGill (Tucker Davis), Tim Russ (Dr. Medford)

Guest Starring (end credits): Lynn A. Henderson (Pamela Olbes)

Co-Starring: Mō (Kevin Hightower), Ricky Adams (Little Kid), Michelle C. Bonilla (Harms), Elyse Dinh (Nurse Martha), Daniel Farber (Griffin), Ben Gould (Ben), Khamani Griffin (Clayton Davis), Forrest Landis (Christopher Shore), Brian Lester (Dumar), Austin Majors (Lucas Shore), E.P. McKnight (Irene), Sasha Mitchell (Bartender), Sumalee Montano (Duvata Mahal), Giovannie Pico (Ludlow), Tami Powers (Janice), Robyn Rice (Nurse Robin), Gabby Soleil (Bridget Davis), Sewell Whitney (Tech)

Plot Overview

Luka and Sam treat a mother of three who is brought into the ER after suffering from a stroke and the woman's husband is forced to decide whether or not he should grant permission for his wife to undergo a risky surgical procedure to reverse the stroke; Neela and Ray discover a shocking secret when three children show up to the ER; Carter finds himself torn between his feelings for Kem while dating Wendall.
